title: Love Island fans beg Cynthia Taylu to DUMP 'player' Maurice Salib
text:
Distraught Love Island Australia fans viewers have flocked to social media to demand that Cynthia Taylu dump Maurice Salib.

Viewers have expressed fears that Maurice may only be using fan favourite Cynthia in a desperate bid to stay on the show.

Photos of the couple together on Cynthia's Instagram page have been flooded with comments from viewers who believe that the West African beauty is being played.

'He is disgusting!' Distraught Love Island Australia fans viewers have flocked to social media to demand that Cynthia Taylu dump Maurice Salib

'He is disgusting mate, you're being played,' one viewer commented.

Another wrote: 'We need to vote him out, he is just trying to get famous. I feel so bad for Cynthia.'

'You deserve so much better it's so sad oh my god,' wrote another.

'He's just trying to get famous!' Viewers have expressed fears that Maurice may only be using fan favourite Cynthia in a desperate bid to stay on the show

The comments didn't stop there, with Maurice's own page now filled with fans who want him booted from the villa.

'Did someone order a dude who should be kicked off?' one fan remarked.

Another wrote: 'I’ll take the abs without the narcissism and lies.'

'I’ll take the abs without the narcissism and lies': The comments didn't stop there, with Maurice's own page now filled with fans who want him booted from the villa

On Monday's episode, Cynthia discovered an article where Maurice's 'ex-girlfriend' Christie Swadling claimed he dumped her two weeks before going on the show.

Asked by Cynthia as to when his last relationship was, Maurice responded: 'My last relationship was like a year ago.'

Christie unleashed on Instagram after the episode, stating that Maurice has 'no legs' to stand on as she has proof of their relationship.
description: Distraught Love Island Australia fans viewers have flocked to social media to demand that Cynthia Taylu dump Maurice Salib.
